snippet: The "super PAC" Winning Our Future posted a campaign ad from 2008 in which John McCain slammed Mitt Romney.
abstract: The "super PAC" Winning Our Future posted a campaign ad from 2008 in which John McCain slammed Mitt Romney.
lead_paragraph: MANCHESTER N.H. -- On the day Mitt Romney rolled out the endorsement of Senator John McCain of Arizona, a "super PAC" backing Newt Gingrich dug out an old gem and put in on the Web.

headline.main: Pro-Gingrich Group Posts Anti-Romney Ad, Featuring McCain
